page.title: 02A Patchway House and Garden
page.content: My house is an end terrace. It has six rooms, the front room, kitchen, hallway, bathroom, my Mum and Dad's bedroom and my bedroom. The best room in my house is my room. It has pink wallpaper and a pink carpet. I am in the back room. My Mum and Dad's room is twice the size of mine. My room has a lot of cupboards. In my bedroom I keep my books and pads and all my pens and pencils. The next best room in my house is the front room because we have a television set and a fire, and the best thing is a three piece suite of chairs and a settee. We have got patio doors leading out onto our patio. We have got the biggest garden in the row of houses. We have lots of flowers. We've got roses, pansies, stocks, and pinks, and in our greenhouse we are growing some more seeds.
